meanings: (의학) necrosis, the death of a portion of the body[organism]
a mystery, a weird, a happening, strange goings-on
death from an unknown cause, a mysterious death, 괴사하다 die from an unknown cause, die a mysterious death,
a case of mysterious death, a mysterious murder case

examples.korean: TEN is an acute skin reaction. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 독성 표피 괴사 용해는 급성 피부 반응이다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: TEN is an acute skin reaction. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They observed the process of necroptosis through the microscope. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 현미경으로 프로그램화된 세포 괴사 과정을 관찰했다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: They observed the process of necroptosis through the microscope. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: During that time, he has been busy promoting his new horror film, 'Shutter,' and shooting another horror flick, 'Necrosis.' 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 기간 동안 그는 자신의 새 공포 영화 '셔터'를 홍보하느라 바빴다. 그리고 또 다른 공포 영화 '네크로시스(괴사)'를 촬영하고 있다. Neungyule
examples.english: During that time, he has been busy promoting his new horror film, 'Shutter,' and shooting another horror flick, 'Necrosis.' Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Professor Seol Dai-wu of Kyungwon University and his team of researchers used a therapy method called TRAIL, or tumor necrosis factor (TNF)-related apoptosis-inducing ligand, with adenovirus. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 경원 대학교의 설대우 교수와 그의 연구팀은 TRAIL [종양괴사인자(TNF) 관련 세포사멸 유도 리간드 유전자를 아데노바이러스와 결합시킨 치료]로 불리는 치료법을 이용했다. Neungyule
examples.english: Professor Seol Dai-wu of Kyungwon University and his team of researchers used a therapy method called TRAIL, or tumor necrosis factor (TNF)-related apoptosis-inducing ligand, with adenovirus. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: When the constriction process continues, skin tissues freeze and could die eventually. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이러한 혈관의 수축 과정이 계속되면 피부 조직이 얼게 되고 결국 괴사하는 경우도 생긴다. EDU TIMES
examples.english: When the constriction process continues, skin tissues freeze and could die eventually. Add to Wordbook
